title: Board Game Trap
description: Sit in a public place with a multiplayer game set up. Don't invite anyone. Just wait.

title: Laundry Room Hostage
description: Ask someone in a shared space for help with something simple (detergent, the time, directions).

title: Culinary Desperate
description: Ask someone at the grocery store or farmers market for a recipe recommendation or cooking advice.

title: Change My Mind
description: Set up a small sign in a public space with a lighthearted opinion and invite respectful disagreement.

title: Post-it War
description: Leave encouraging sticky notes in random public places (library books, bathroom mirrors, bus stops).

title: Fake Smoker Zone
description: Stand near a social gathering space without participating. Make yourself available for conversation.

title: Underground Barber
description: Offer to teach someone a simple skill you have in exchange for learning something from them.
